item.title: Mantle(@Mantle_Official) has surpassed $4B in treasury assets, making it the top-ranked treasury in the market.
item.description: Mantle(@Mantle_Official) has surpassed $4B in treasury assets, making it the top-ranked treasury in the market.

item.title: Ethereum Long Liquidation on the Verge of Collapse After [Sell the HYPE and Long ETH Whale] Move, with Unrealized Loss Reaching a High of $19.27 Million
item.description: On August 29th, according to Ashes Monitor, the long position of Ethereum held by [Whale Selling after HYPE and Opening a Long Position] is on the verge of liquidation. Currently, its ETH long position is facing an unrealized loss of up to $19.27 million.Its long position of 86,800 ETH ($380 million) has a liquidation price of $4,344, and the current ETH price is already at $4,386, just a little short of $50.

item.title: Ethereum ICO Participation Address Awakens After Over a Decade of Dormancy, Achieving an Overall Return of 14,177x
item.description: On August 29th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, a participant in the #Ethereum ICO with the address "0x42D3" has just carried out a test transfer of 0.01 ETH. This participant had been silent for more than a decade. He had only invested $49 in the ICO and received 158 ETH. Currently, the value of 158 ETH is $694,000, with a return of 14,177 times.

item.title: Binance Alpha: CeluvPlay (CELB) Airdrop Threshold 220 Points, First Come First Served
item.description: August 29th. According to the official announcement, trading of CeluvPlay (CELB) will begin on August 29, 2025, at 17:00 (UTC + 8). After the start of trading, users who hold at least 220 Alpha Points can claim a 3,200 CELB token airdrop. The first come, first served principle applies. If the event is not yet completed, the points threshold will automatically decrease by 15 points every hour.

item.title: Opinion: Ethereum may consolidate in the $4,000-5,000 range for about a quarter, and then start the next uptrend
item.description: On August 29th, cryptocurrency analyst @IamCryptoWolf released a market view on the 26th. He stated that ETH had broken through the multi-year resistance level of $4000 after a 250% increase. Subsequently, it is likely to consolidate in the $4000 - $5000 range for nearly a quarter and then start the next round of upward movement.@IamCryptoWolf published his analytical views on the TradingView platform in 2014 and has 111,000 followers on the X platform.

item.title: OKX 34th Period PoR: Total Value of BTC, ETH, USDT, USDC Reaches $33.7 Billion
item.description: On August 29th, as per official channels, OKEx put out the 34th Reserve Proof of Reserves. The reserve ratios of 22 disclosed assets all achieved 100%. BTC, ETH, USDT, and USDC had reserve ratios of 106%, 104%, 105%, and 100% respectively. The total value of these four assets reached $33,700,118,320.OKEx has become the first exchange in the industry to continuously release POR for more than two years. During this period, OKEx has been releasing PoR monthly, with the number of disclosed assets increasing from 3 to 22. OKEx has been continuously upgrading the PoR system by using technologies such as Merkle Tree, Panoramic Merkle Tree, and zk-STARK, demonstrating its dedication to providing asset transparency for users.

item.title: Binance: The remaining quota of the Plasma USDT lock-up product has now been fully subscribed
item.description: On August 29th, as per an official announcement, all the remaining quota of Binance's Plasma USDT locking product has been fully subscribed at present. And no more quota will be announced in the future.Consequently, the TVL (Total Value Locked) of Binance's On-Chain Yields Plasma USDT locking product has exceeded 1 billion USDT.

item.title: Within the last hour, a total of $64.56 million has been liquidated across the entire network, with long positions being the primary liquidation type.
item.description: On August 29th, according to Coinglass data, nearly $64.56 million was liquidated throughout the entire network within a one-hour timeframe. Among them, long positions accounted for $62.48 million of the total.

item.title: In July, a whale/institutional investor holding 30.03 million FORM tokens transferred 8 million tokens to a CEX in less than 1 hour, realizing a total unrealized gain of $28.82 million.
item.description: On August 29th, as per Cinder Monitor, this whale/institution had amassed a total of 30.03 million FORM (equivalent to 82.82 million). The average price at which they accumulated was $2.76 in early July.Today, nearly two months later, they began to move to CEX: in the past 1 hour, they transferred 8 million FORM (amounting to 29.80 million USD) to CEX, with 5 million going to Binance and 3 million to Gate.The current price of FORM has now reached $3.72. The 30.03 million FORM they accumulated in early July has already generated a profit of 28.82 million USD. There are still 22.03 million FORM (valued at 79.75 million USD) in their address.

item.title: Ethereum briefly dropped below $4,400, with a nearly 1.17% decrease in the past hour.
item.description: On August 29th, according to HTX market data, Ethereum briefly fell below $4400 and is currently trading at $4405.84, experiencing a nearly 1% decrease in the past hour.
